# NSXPCConnectionCodeSigningRequirementFailure

**Global Variable**

A code-signing requirement check failed.

## Declaration

```swift
var NSXPCConnectionCodeSigningRequirementFailure: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

This error represents a failure to meet the requirement set by a call to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCConnection]‘s [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCConnection/setCodeSigningRequirement(_:)] method, or NSXPCConnectionListener’s [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCListener/setConnectionCodeSigningRequirement(_:)] method.

## Error codes

- **NSXPCConnectionInterrupted**: The XPC connection was interrupted.
- **NSXPCConnectionInvalid**: The XPC connection was invalid.
- **NSXPCConnectionReplyInvalid**: The XPC connection reply was invalid.
- **NSXPCConnectionErrorMinimum**: The lower bounds of XPC connection error code values.
- **NSXPCConnectionErrorMaximum**: The upper bounds of XPC connection error code values.
